name: Boiler
body:
### Boiler
Sick and tired of copy and pasting libraries for web sites or downloading a boilerplate for each new site that you do? I am so lazy, I hate making the directories over and over again. So this sparked my little tool for Mac users. A shell or command line to rule them all!

```
$ ./install.sh
$ boil help
```

### Authors and Contributors
Admin::@avintagephoto

### Support or Contact
Message me on git hub or email me at apriendeau@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
